name: Dr. Hackerman
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 46.

Your friendly neighbourhood robot is in trouble. A notorious evil hacker wants to shut them down. They don't have long, but only Dr. Hackerman can help to keep it alive by counter-hacking the hacker.

Controls:

Typing - Type the approaching words to block the hacker.
Escape - Hit escape to pause the game.
Click - Click menu buttons to navigate.
